name: Speakeasy (Fabzter)
description:
Speakeasy Controls

Move:  ARROW KEY or WASD

Interact: SPACE

Buy furniture: LEFT MOUSE CLICK

Menu: ESC

Build and upgrade

Buying new furniture will attract more customer. But be careful, more customers also mean more noise.... And who knows what happens when you make too much noise.

Level up

Earn talent points each time you level up, which you can assign to 4 skills.

Charisma - Earn extra money when you clean tables

Speed - Increase movement speed

Strength - Allow you to carry more drinks

Luck - Chance to get 2x money when you clean tables

Manage employees

Once you've build a desk, you will be able to hire employees. Each employee can be promoted to increase their movement speed. But by doing this, you also increase their salary.
